sect1.title: Relative class types
sect1.para: These types declarations can only be used within classes.

sect2.para: The value must be an &instanceof; the same class as the one in which the type declaration is used.
The value must be an &instanceof; a parent of the class in which the type declaration is used.

sect2.title: static
sect2.para: static is a return-only type which requires that the value returned must be an &instanceof; the same class as the one the method is called in. Available as of PHP 8.0.0.
